name: Masked Language Modeling
description: Masked language modeling is a fill-in-the-blank task, where a model uses the context words surrounding a [MASK] token to try to predict what the [MASK] word should be.
expected_inputs: Text string with one or more [MASK] tokens.
expected_outputs: Most likely word subsitutions for each [MASK] token.

examples.sentence: The doctor ran to the emergency room to see [MASK] patient.
The woman wept because she was [MASK].
My dog is [MASK] and likes to [MASK] the entire [MASK].
